english: He was sentenced to 3 years for forgery .
chinese: 他因伪造文件被判3年徒刑。

english: He was sentenced to 3 years for forgery .
chinese: 他因假造文件被判了三年徒刑。

english: The manager annexed his seal to the document .
It turned out to be a shallow document .
chinese: 它结果竟是一份空空洞洞的文件。

english: This procedure is called program documentation .
chinese: 这个过程叫做程序文件。
文件造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Why are you poking about among my papers ?
chinese: 你为什么乱翻我的文件？

english: Who scattered my papers all over the floor ?
chinese: 谁把我的文件扔得满地都是？

english: He insisted that the papers should be destroyed .
chinese: 他坚持那些文件得销毁。

english: It was an exceedingly able statement .
chinese: 这是一个非常出色的文件。

english: I have read-only access to my bank files .
chinese: 我用只读方式存取我的银行文件。
这些文件“很有见地，很有帮助”。

english: You might want to look over these dispatches .
chinese: 你或许还要看一下这些文件。
法律顾问翻动了一叠文件。

english: We 'd better pin [clip] the papers together .
chinese: 我们最好把这些文件别在一起。

english: Every now and then he would burn all his papers .
chinese: 他时常烧毁他的所有文件。
